parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the serpentine fan belt can cause a loss of power steering and power brakes, making it difficult or impossible to stop the vehicle, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: the brake pedal is hard to press
the vehicle takes a long distance to stop.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the exhaust manifold can cause fumes to enter the vehicle, leading to sickness for the occupants, and can also cause the vehicle to stall or lose power.
symptoms: the vehicle stalls or loses power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the antifreeze line can cause coolant to leak out, leading to engine overheating and potential engine damage.

The failure of the brake system can cause a loss of braking power, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities. In addition, brake fluid leaks or overheating can cause fires, further increasing the risk of harm.
symptoms: Strong smell of hot brake fluid
minor fires due to brake issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to honor warranty claims and provide adequate service can leave customers with unsafe vehicles and significant financial burdens.
symptoms: lack of assistance with tire blowouts and related damage.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Failure to Engage Reverse Gear
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission to engage reverse gear can cause accidents, especially when reversing out of parking spaces or driveways, and can lead to property damage or personal injury.
symptoms: The vehicle fails to shift into reverse gear
especially after driving at high speeds or when the transmission is at full operating temperature
the vehicle may shift into reverse gear after a period of cooling down.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Suspension System Instability Due to Dual Tank Design
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design flaw of having both water and gas tanks filled simultaneously can cause the vehicle to become unstable, making it difficult to steer and control, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: sagging or leaning to one side.
